wishwa nyayawedaya pilibanda siyalu karunu athulath ek suthrak budu dahame nathi namuth agganynya suthraya (digha nikaya. 27 wana suthraya), maha sudassana suthraya (digha nikaya. 17 wana suthraya), chakkawaththi sihanada suthraya (digha nikaya. 26 wana suthraya), maha padana suthraya (digha nikaya, 14 wana suthraya) pramukha pali wibhajjawadayehi wiwidha dharma kotas wala mema karunu kotasin kotasa anthargatha wi thibe.namuth bauddha wishwa nyayawedaya adhyayanaya kirimedi pahadili wana pradhana karuna nam budun wahanse dharmaya deshana kirimedi wadi washayenma awadhanaya yomu kale awakasha wishwa nyayawedayehi chakrawada kotasata bawayi.
